title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library that wraps the Ollama REST API for chatting, pulling and managing local models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers to interact with a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration that lets you plug any Ollama-hosted model into chains, agents and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web interface for Ollama with folder-organised chats, model manager and GPU monitoring.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama offering sync/async APIs, POJO mapping and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community Ruby gem that wraps the Ollama REST API for Rails and scripting use-cases.

title: ollama-cli (npm)
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI written in Node that wraps ollama-js for chatting, model pulls and logs.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local AI pair-programming using any Ollama model as a Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration enabling Ollama models in production-grade RAG and agentic pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET 8 community SDK with strongly-typed requests/responses and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that streams Ollama model replies into any channel with slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node-selector and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger SDK module that lets CI pipelines spin up Ollama containers and run model tests reproducibly.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference repo showing how to build a private RAG system with Ollama embeddings and llama-index.

title: ollama-gui-react
summary: Lightweight React front-end (Vite) for chatting with Ollama models, packaged as a static Docker image.

title: ollama-terraform
summary: Terraform module to provision EC2 GPU instances with Ollama pre-installed and model cache on EFS.

title: ollama-macos-menu
summary: Swift-native macOS menu-bar app that starts/stops Ollama server and lists downloaded models.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant panel powered by any Ollama model for note Q&A.

title: ollama-pypi-downloads
summary: PyPI page showing official ollama Python package download stats and release history.
